articles.title: Seymour Stein, music mogul who discovered Madonna, Talking Heads and more, dies aged 80 - The Guardian
articles.description: Influential executive co-founded Sire Records and signed Lou Reed, the Ramones and introduced the Smiths and the Cure to the US
articles.content:
Seymour Stein, the music executive who launched the careers of Madonna, Talking Heads and the Ramones, and introduced the Cure, Depeche Mode and the Smiths to America, has died aged 80.
